scripts.example:chat:css: cd examples/chat && tailwindcss --config tailwind.config.cjs --input src/css/styles.css --output static/index.generated.css
scripts.example:chat:serve: npm run example:chat:build && npm run example:chat:css && cd examples/chat && esbuild --bundle --outfile=static/index.js --servedir=static src/js/index.js
scripts.server:stop: kill $(ps -e | grep 'ts-node test/ts/test-server.ts' | grep -v grep | xargs | cut -d ' ' -f 1)
